overview: Mark Leckey’s heady Dream English Kid started with a found bootleg video of a Joy Division gig that Leckey attended in 1979-- and the realisation that snippets of our personal memories and experiences may now be found online. The film is a record of the significant events in Leckey’s life during the late 20th century through traces of film, adverts and popular music.
title: Dream English Kid 1964-1999 AD
